item.title: 大众汽车表示，巴西可持续发展规则不应让汽车变得更加昂贵
item.description: Brazil's new incentive program to promote investment in sustainability by the country's auto sector needs to avoid making vehicles more expensive, Volkswagen's head of Brazil Ciro Possobom said.翻译:大众汽车巴西业务负责人西罗·波索博姆 (Ciro Possobom) 表示，巴西旨在促进该国汽车行业可持续发展投资的新激励计划需要避免使车辆变得更加昂贵。
item.author: Alberto Alerigi Jr.

item.title: 独家：卢比奥敦促 SEC 阻止 Shein IPO，除非披露中国运营风险
item.description: Republican Senator Marco Rubio asked the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to block Shein’s bid to list publicly in New York unless the e-tailer makes additional disclosures about its business operations and "the serious risks of doing business" in China.翻译:共和党参议员马可·卢比奥 (Marco Rubio) 要求美国证券交易委员会阻止 Shein 在纽约公开上市的申请，除非这家电子零售商进一步披露其业务运营以及在中国“开展业务的严重风险”。
item.author: Katherine Masters

item.title: 福特和通用汽车首席执行官愿意建立合作伙伴关系以与中国竞争
item.description: The chief executives of U.S. automakers Ford and General Motors said on Thursday they would consider partnerships to cut electric vehicle technology costs as Chinese rivals move into the U.S. and European markets.翻译:美国汽车制造商福特和通用汽车的首席执行官周四表示，随着中国竞争对手进军美国和欧洲市场，他们将考虑建立合作伙伴关系，以降低电动汽车技术成本。
item.author: Joseph White, Nathan Gomes

item.title: 在罗马争执中，Stellantis 首席执行官表示意大利工厂有未来
item.description: Stellantis CEO Carlos Tavares said on Thursday the carmaker will need all of its Italian factories to hit its long-term production goal there, in conciliatory remarks that may ease tensions between the Fiat car maker and Rome.翻译:Stellantis首席执行官卡洛斯·塔瓦雷斯(Carlos Tavares)周四表示，该汽车制造商将需要其所有意大利工厂来实现其在那里的长期生产目标，这一和解言论可能会缓解菲亚特汽车制造商与罗马之间的紧张关系。
item.author: Giulio Piovaccari

item.title: Joo的梅开二度帮助蔚山进入亚洲冠军联赛四分之一决赛
item.description: Ulsan Hyundai put one foot in the quarter-finals of the Asian Champions League on Thursday as the South Korean champions handed Japanese second division side Ventforet Kofu a 3-0 defeat at Ulsan Munsu Stadium.翻译:周四，蔚山现代队在蔚山文殊体育场以 3-0 击败日本乙级联赛甲府文特林队，踏入亚洲冠军联赛四分之一决赛。
item.author: Michael Church

item.title: 数百万人从农历新年旅行归来，预计中国将迎来寒流
item.description: A cold snap is forecast to sweep across many parts of China from this weekend, with temperatures falling by up to 20 degrees Celsius as millions return from Lunar New Year trips, the national observatory said on Thursday.翻译:国家气象台周四表示，预计从本周末开始，一股寒流将席卷中国大部分地区，随着数百万人春节旅行归来，气温将下降高达20摄氏度。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：强调科技主导的美国“例外主义”
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 马克龙和泽连斯基将于周五签署双边安全协议 - 爱丽舍宫
item.description: France and Ukraine will sign a bilateral agreement on security commitments this Friday, the French presidency said on Thursday.翻译:法国总统周四表示，法国和乌克兰将于本周五签署一项关于安全承诺的双边协议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 葛兰素史克 (GSK) 以高达 14 亿美元完成对 Aiolos Bio 的收购
item.description: GSK said on Thursday it had completed the acquisition of Aiolos Bio, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on respiratory and inflammatory conditions.翻译:葛兰素史克周四表示，已完成对 Aiolos Bio 的收购，Aiolos Bio 是一家专注于呼吸和炎症疾病的临床阶段生物制药公司。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：俄罗斯人利用中国合作伙伴在闲置的斯特兰蒂斯工厂生产雪铁龙汽车
item.description: Carmaker Stellantis halted production in Russia in April 2022.翻译:汽车制造商 Stellantis 于 2022 年 4 月停止在俄罗斯的生产。
item.author: Gleb Stolyarov, Alexander Marrow

item.title: 保乐力加股价因增长复苏的希望而上涨
item.description: Pernod Ricard's shares rose over 6% on Thursday as the French spirits maker left its longer-term growth ambitions intact, even as it cut its full-year sales estimate and its share buyback programme.翻译:法国烈酒制造商保乐力加 (Pernod Ricard) 的股价周四上涨超过 6%，尽管该公司下调了全年销售预期和股票回购计划，但仍保持其长期增长目标不变。
item.author: Dominique Vidalon, Emma Rumney

item.title: 上次阿波罗登月任务半个世纪后，美国私人月球着陆器发射升空
item.description: A moon lander built by Houston-based aerospace company Intuitive Machines was launched from Florida early on Thursday on a mission to conduct the first U.S. lunar touchdown in more than a half century and the first by a privately owned spacecraft.翻译:周四早些时候，总部位于休斯敦的航空航天公司 Intuitive Machines 制造的月球着陆器从佛罗里达州发射升空，其任务是进行美国半个多世纪以来的首次月球着陆，也是私人航天器的首次着陆。
item.author: Joe Skipper, Steve Gorman

item.title: 菲律宾承诺遵守南海行为准则
item.description: The Philippines is firmly committed to negotiations for a code of conduct between China and Southeast Asian countries to avert confrontations in the South China Sea, its foreign minister said on Thursday.翻译:菲律宾外长周四表示，菲律宾坚定致力于中国与东南亚国家之间就行为准则进行谈判，以避免南海对抗。
item.author: Karen Lema

item.title: 中国抱怨前线岛屿附近发生致命事故后，台湾捍卫海岸警卫队
item.description: Taiwan on Thursday defended the actions of its coast guard after two people on a Chinese speedboat, which got too close to a frontline Taiwanese island, died when their boat overturned while trying to flee a coast guard ship.翻译:周四，台湾为其海岸警卫队的行动进行了辩护，此前一艘中国快艇因太靠近台湾前线岛屿而在试图逃离海岸警卫队船只时翻船，造成两人死亡。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 随着经济放缓，一些中国年轻人放弃了企业工作，转而追求“自我时间”
item.description: Faced with diminishing job prospects as the economy slows, Chu Yi is choosing to "lie flat", a Chinese term used to describe people who work just enough to afford to spend their time on what they enjoy.翻译:面对经济放缓带来的就业前景黯淡，褚毅选择“平躺”，这是一个中文术语，用来形容那些工作只够花时间做自己喜欢的事情的人。
item.author: Nicoco Chan

item.title: 部分大众汽车因中国零件在美国港口延误
item.description: Volkswagen said on Wednesday it expected to resolve by the end of March delays in the delivery of thousands of vehicles held up at U.S. ports due to a customs problem.翻译:大众汽车周三表示，预计将在 3 月底之前解决因海关问题而滞留在美国港口的数千辆汽车的交付延误问题。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：德国对华投资创历史新高
item.description: German direct investment in China rose by 4.3% to a record high of 11.9 billion euros ($12.7 billion) last year and also increased as a share of the country's overall investment abroad, official Bundesbank data analysed by the IW institute showed.翻译:IW研究所分析的德国央行官方数据显示，去年德国对华直接投资增长4.3%，达到创纪录的119亿欧元（127亿美元），占德国对外投资总额的比重也有所增加。
item.author: Sarah Marsh

item.title: 中国、美国主导的全球补充枯竭石油库存有望提振需求
item.description: A push to replenish depleted oil stocks notably in China, the United States and Europe could buoy demand and prices in coming months, analysts and traders said, as tensions in the Middle East threaten key shipping lanes.翻译:分析师和交易商表示，随着中东紧张局势威胁到主要航道，推动补充耗尽的石油库存（尤其是在中国、美国和欧洲）可能会在未来几个月提振需求和价格。
item.author: Natalie Grover, Noah Browning, Ahmad Ghaddar

item.title: 台湾报告中国在附近进行另一次“战备巡逻”
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said it detected 14 Chinese air force planes operating around Taiwan and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships on Wednesday.翻译:台湾国防部表示，周三发现有 14 架中国空军飞机在台湾周围活动，并与中国军舰进行“联合战备巡逻”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国太平洋盟友所罗门群岛预计将于四月举行选举
item.description: The Solomon Islands is expected to next week call a national election for April, with China security ties emerging as a key issue as political parties launch campaigns in the Pacific Islands nation.翻译:所罗门群岛预计将于下周举行四月份全国大选，随着各政党在这个太平洋岛国发起竞选活动，与中国的安全关系将成为一个关键问题。
item.author: Kirsty Needham
